resources.string:
Analyzes social media content for potential scams, phishing attempts, and other harmful content. Displays safety ratings as colored badges over posts to help protect you from online threats.
This service monitors text content in supported social media apps including Twitter/X, Reddit, Facebook, Discord, and Instagram. All analysis is performed locally on your device and no data is transmitted externally.
The service is designed to be minimally intrusive and only activates when viewing social media content.
